articles.author: HT News Desk
articles.title: Paytm COO and president Bhavesh Gupta resigns, cites personal reasons - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Paytm's COO and president Bhavesh Gupta resigned from his posts at the fintech company citing personal reasons.
articles.content: Paytm's COO and president Bhavesh Gupta on Saturday resigned from his posts at the company citing personal reasons, a company statement said. The fintech company said in its regulatory filing that Gu… [+2017 chars]
